title: please check my history for trolls
body: so every second game ive lost now in ranked. i BEG YOU! please check the adc i get in my ranked on every defeat. they are freaking inting ive been trying for almost 4 hours to go from gold 2 50 lp to gold 1. ITS IMPOSSIBLE RIOT IF YOU DONT BAN THESE TROLLS/WINTRADERS. its actually disgusting and sad. PLEASE CHECK MY GAMES. i dont deserve to lose LP because of a troll in my team going 1/10 at 8 mins!!!

replies.body:
1 / 10 at 8 minutes lol

I once had  0 / 22 / 0 at 13 minutes heimer mid ( - 15 LP )
